sourcesContent:
import { React , useState , useEffect } from 'react' import './post.css' import { MoreVert,ThumbUpAlt } from "@material-ui/icons"; import {format} from 'timeago.js' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' export default function Post({post}) { const [like,setLike] = useState(post.likes.length) const [isliked,setIsLiked] = useState(false) const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const [user, setUser] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchUser = async () => { const res = await axios.get( `/users/${post.userId}`); setUser(res.data) console.log(user) } fetchUser(); },[post.userId]) const likehander = () => { setIsLiked(!isliked) setLike(isliked?like-1:like+1) } return (
{user.username} {format(post.createdAt)}
{post.desc}
{like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
